solution_line_template: First, we have to come up with the balance before her withdrawal. ${current_balance} (current) + ${amount_withdrawn} (withdraw) = $<<{current_balance}+{amount_withdrawn}={balance_before_withdrawal}>>{balance_before_withdrawal}.
Now since we know that is triple, we divide by {triple_factor}. ${balance_before_withdrawal} / {triple_factor} = $<<{balance_before_withdrawal}/{triple_factor}={initial_balance}>>{initial_balance}
